title: BBC.Drama.2015.10.31.The.Dresser.EN.SUB.x264.WEBRIP.[MPup]
description:
BBC.Drama.2015.10.31.The.Dresser.EN.SUB.x264.WEBRIP.[MPup]

Format: MPEG-4
Size: 1280x720
DisplayAspectRatio: 16:9
FrameRate: 25.000 fps
AudioCodec: AAC
Channels: 2 channels
SamplingRate: 48.0 KHz

In a touring Shakespearean theatre company, backstage hand Norman is devoted to the brilliant but tyrannical head of the company, Sir. He struggles to support the deteriorating star as the company works to carry on during the London blitz during World War Two. The pathos of his backstage efforts rival the pathos in Shakespeare's story of Lear and the Fool from his play King Lear, which is being presented on stage, as the situation comes to a crisis.

[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/11/03/247491c49f11784d86c1f7cc68d2ff4c.jpg[/img]

Drama based on Ronald Harwood's successful play, about the working relationship between an ageing actor and head of a touring Shakespearean theatre company, and his personal assistant. Set against the backdrop of a production of Lear and the Fool during the Blitz, the leading light's work and reputation begin to deteriorate as the situation reaches crisis point
